Thanatophobia

Their courage fades in the face of their undeniable mortality.
* Each injured, dying, or hooked Survivor afflicts Survivors with a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">1.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">2</span>''' '''&#37;''' Action Speed penalty to Repairing, Sabotaging, and Cleansing, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''&#37;'''.

Their courage fades in the face of their undeniable mortality.
  • Each injured, dying, or hooked Survivor afflicts Survivors with a stack-able 1/1.5/2 % Action Speed penalty to Repairing, Sabotaging, and Cleansing, up to a maximum of 4/6/8 %.
  • Increases the Action Speed penalty by a further 12 %, if there are 4 Survivors, who are either injured, dying, or hooked at the same time.

* The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the damaged Generator is revealed to all Survivors in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.
